name: Space Beats
description:
An action packed bullet hell rythm game in space. Unlike a traditional bullet hell, you have to shoot near the beat. If you shoot right on it, it doubles your damage!

Including:
  • 18 Unique levels
  • 2 Power ups
  • Enemy types
  • Bosses
Controls:
  • WASD for movement
  • Click to shoot
Tools used:
  • C++
  • SFML
  • Code::Blocks
  • Aseprite
  • FL Studio 12
  • Sfxr
